Sector: Cognizant Technology Solutions Corporation is a leading professional services company. It offers digital services and solutions, consulting, application development, systems integration, application testing, application maintenance, infrastructure services and business process services. The company is focusing its investments on four key areas of digital: IoT, AI, experience-driven software engineering and cloud. The company primarily serves four domains: Financial Services, Healthcare, Products & Resources and Communications, Media & Technology.
